title: Skint Dad's budget stir fry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '375g boneless skinless turkey meat, sliced', '1 onion, sliced', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 carrot, cut into matchsticks', 'a few leaves cabbage, finely sliced', '150g beansprouts', '250g noodles', '1 tablespoon soya sauce', '200ml chicken stock']
